benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client

Class UtvarDetailActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client.CrimeActivityBase<CrimeUtvarDetail>
        • benak.tomas.crimemonitor.client.UtvarDetailActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CrimeDataLoadingListener<CrimeUtvarDetail>, KodUtvaruLoadingListener, SelectCrimeDateIntervalDialogFragment.SelectCrimeDateIntervalDialogFragmentExceptionHandler, SelectCrimeDateIntervalDialogFragment.SelectCrimeDateIntervalDialogListener

    public class UtvarDetailActivity
extends CrimeActivityBase<CrimeUtvarDetail>
    UtvarDetailActivity is the activity class used to display the police department detailed info.

    As in every CrimeActivityBase, the department info is displayed for the current location and loaded in background by a loading fragment on demand or in reponse to the location changes.

    The activity displays the following information about the police department:

    • the police department full name
    • the list of names of all municipalities that are "covered" by the given police department

      A municipality is "covered", if the territory of the police department intersects with territory of the given municipality.

    Author:
    Tom
    See Also:
    CrimeUtvarDetail, CrimeActivityBase, UtvarDetailLoadingFragment

      • getObecView

        public View getObecView(int position,
               java.lang.String nazevObce)
        Creates the view for a municipality item in the list of the covered municipalities.

        The background color differs according to the position being an even or odd number. This creates the list with the items that alternate their background color.

        Parameters:
        position - the position of a municipality item to create the view for
        nazevObce - the municipality item (simply the municipality name) to create the view for
        Returns:
        the view for a municipality item in the list of the covered municipalities

      • startCrimeActivity

        private void startCrimeActivity(java.lang.String actionString)
        Starts the activity identified by the given Intent action.

        An intent is created, the parameters are set as extras for the intent, the default category is set for the intent and the given action is set for the intent. Then an activity is started with this intent.

        Parameters:
        actionString - the string identifying an action to be passed to an Intent starting the activity
